column4: can anyone at all help me as to why my network never starts at boot? ... it's set to auto in /etc/network/interfaces... so i'm at a loss as to why it won't work.. anyone?
auto means dhcp, try this "sudo ln -s /etc/init.d/networking /etc/rc2.d"
did that.. rebooted.. still doing the same
my bad Smeggy, you'll have to do something like "sudo ln -s /etc/init.d/networking /etc/rc2.d/S50networking"
